abstract: Big East college football conference will have only five teams after West Virginia's planned departure to the Big 12 becomes official, calling into question whether the league will survive or divide.
snippet: With West Virginia’s departure, the conference’s five football members will be Rutgers, Louisville, South Florida, Connecticut and Cincinnati.
lead_paragraph: With West Virginia’s departure, the conference’s five football members will be Rutgers, Louisville, South Florida, Connecticut and Cincinnati.

headline.main: W. Virginia Is Close to Joining the Big 12
headline.print_headline: W. Virginia Is Close To Joining The Big 12
headline.seo: West Virginia Close to Leaving Big East for Big 12
